cause.description:
Look it up on wikipedia if you want, basically straight edge is a lifestyle that evolved out of 80s Hardcore punk where the goal is to life a drug free lifestyle (no alcohol, no drugs, no painkillers...). Many members support other facets such as sexual abstinence and veganism. It is about taking care of your body for yourself, for your friends and for your family.
1. I do not need drugs to get through my life.
2. Drugs include alcohol, painkillers,etc.
cause.mission: live life with a clear mind
cause.name: xSTRAIGHTEDGEx
